text: Marcell Berki (born 14 June 2004) is a Hungarian professional footballer. He plays as forward for Austrian Second League club Liefering. He also plays for the FC Salzburg squad in the UEFA Youth League 2021-22 and the U18 team of the Red Bull Academy. ==Club career== He started in Hungary with Videoton FC. 2019 he went to the Red Bull Salzburg Academy where he played in all three teams. In February 2022 he debuted for FC Liefering when he came in for Oumar Diakité in minute 74 versus SKN St. Pölten. He also played three matches for FC Salzburg U19 in the UEFA Youth League 2021-22 season. In July 2022 he received a professional contract with Red Bull Salzburg that ran until June 2026. RB Salzburg Homepage (German) == International career== He played for the Hungarian U16 team. ==References== Category:2004 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Liefering players
title: Marcell Berki
